title: London/South Kensington-Chelsea
name: Brompton Cemetery
address: entrances on Old Brompton Road and Fulham Rd
directions: tube: West Brompton, Earl's Court or Fulham Broadway
content: One of the "Magnificent Seven" old cemeteries in London.  Graves range from plain to ornate and the site can be a tranquil place to walk amid the bustle of the city.  It was opened in 1840 and is still a working cemetery, although it was closed for a some time in the late twentieth century.  Can be nice, if morbid, for an afternoon stroll, especially as a route (and cycle route) between Old Brompton Road and Fulham Road.
